title: Hour 1 -  Albert Breer (07-28-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 -  Albert Breer (07-28-20)
description:
Albert Breer explains to Dan what the NFL may have learned from the covid outbreaks in the MLB. Albert Says the NFL is like the MLB because they both play outside and they both do not play in a bubble.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
